title: The Mob Doctor
resume: For most physicians, the Hippocratic oath is sacred. But for one Chicago  doctor, who is indebted to the mafia, saving lives isn’t her only  concern. The Mob Doctor is a fast-paced medical drama focusing on a  young female surgeon caught between two worlds as she juggles her  promising medical career with her family’s debt to Chicago’s Southside  mob.
